ARABIC: أَمْ لَمْ يُنَبَّأْ بِمَا فِى صُحُفِ مُوسَىٰ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Or has he not been informed what is in the texts of Musa
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Has he not heard what is contained in the Book of Moses,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Has he not been informed of what is in the Scrolls of Moses,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Has not he been informed of the contents of the Book of Moses
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Did not the news reach him, of that which is mentioned in the Books of Moosa?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Or is he not informed with what is in the Suhuf of Musa,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Or, has he not been informed of what is in the scriptures of Musa?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Or has he not been told of what is in the scrolls of Moses,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Or hath he not had news of what is in the books of Moses
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Has he not been made acquainted with what was written in the scriptures of Moses?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Hath he not been told of that which is in the writs of Musa.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Has he not been informed of what is in the scriptures of Moses,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Nay, is he not acquainted with what is in the Books of Moses-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Or is he not informed with what is in the Pages (Scripture) of Musa (Moses),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Or, has he not been told of that which is in the Scrolls of Moses
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Or was he not informed of what is in the Scrolls of Moses?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Or has he not been informed of what was in the scriptures of Moses
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [53:36] Or (am means bal) has he not been informed of what is in the scrolls of Moses, the books of the Torah, or scrolls before it,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Or hath he not had news) has he not been informed in the Qur'an (of what is in the books of Moses) He says: in the Torah and the scrolls of Abraham.
